review: I am so happy that I traded in satellite for the Amazon stick. Hubby works a lot, son is away at college, I am studying in school, so we rarely watch TV. But when we do we use sling TV on the amazon fire stick. the cost is $20 /mo compared to satellite at $120/month and the prices keep going higher. Even adding Hulu and Netflix are more affordable and we can watch on our time. We are very pleased!!

review: I purchased this because the user interface on my Sony Smart TV leaves a lot to be desired.  I thought this would be better.  It's not.  I thought it would be similar to Roku.  It's not.  I use a Roku on another TV and when I travel.  The Amazon Fire TV stick interface wasn't very intuitive, and it was difficult to find "channels" that I wanted to reference often.  Maybe I'm spoiled by my Roku 3.  If you are looking for a streaming device, I recommend that you pay a little more and get a Roku 3.
author: Beach Boomer
